dmca.title: [EV1-C2471216M] Legal complaint about contents in your web [1669/07]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Monday, January 08, 2007 9:30 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C2471216M] Legal complaint about contents in your web [1669/07]

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

Jan 8 2007 12:21 pm

From: =?iso-8859-1?Q?Seguridad_L=F3gica-BIT?= <seguridad.logica@policia.es>
Subject: Legal complaint about contents in your web [1669/07]
To: ilovethebeach@gmail.com
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com
Message-id: <001401c73351$643b1670$0ee2270a@dgp.mir.es>
MIME-version: 1.0
X-MIMEOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2180
X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2180
Content-type: multipart/alternative;
 boundary="Boundary_(ID_aNtf61x3PTFx/p0v4/zx0A)" 
X-Priority: 3
X-MSMail-priority: Normal
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 08 Jan 2007 18:20:49.0682 (UTC) FILETIME=[B941E720:01C73351] 

 (multipart/alternative)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sir: 
 
My name is Martin from the Spanish National Police High Tech Crime Unit. I´m
writing you about some photos published in your web under the url:
http://galleries.ilovethebeach.com/gal3036.shtml  
 
We have a legal complaint from a Spanish woman who appears in this page. She has not
given her conformity to this photos. As we undestood this must be published by a
mistake and we kindly ask you to eliminate this photos before taking any other legal
measures. 
 
Thank in advance for your collaboration. 
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Spanish National Police High Tech Crime Unit Brigada de Investigación Tecnológica 
 
Seguridad Lógica 
 
C/ Julian González Segador s/n 28043, Madrid 
 
Tfno +34 91 582 27 47
Fax +34 91 582 27 56 
 
https://www.policia.es/bit/index.htm
